subject: Horse Racing
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horses
lead_paragraph: If Bernardini, a 3-year-old sensation, runs to his even-money odds and the victory in the Breeders’ Cup Classic, he almost certainly will be retired to stud at a breeding farm.
